Class Player

java.lang.Object
Player
public class Player extends Object
Class Player - a player in an adventure game. This class is part of the "World of Zuul" application. "World of Zuul" is a very simple, text based adventure game. A single "Player" object is created in the "Game" class, and it primarily stores data of the inventory the playerUser is holding throughout the game
Version:
2016.02.29
Author:
Michael KÃ¶lling and David J. Barnes and Ahmer Alam
